.SKILL TEST FOR THE POST OF STENOGRAPHER/HINDI & ENGLISH OF CEN-03/2014 

~.$-.vo=r-03/2014 ~ ~ JIT~~~~ l!Ci" Wt#r ~ ~ ~ ft;rv ~~ qfnm ~Mffin:gC1 
.;) 

Cfli~Shfl ~ 31affiR" 311ll11"81C1 *'" ~~ ~ ~ ~ "CJT:r 3<F<HIC<qJ'1.1 ~ U<;r m ~ ~ ~ ~ 
.;) 

.31R16r 5f1J1 "Jf ("ttftr E "Jf ~) ~ ~ "JTV 6'1 
The Skill Test for the post of Stenographer/Hindi & English of CEN-03/2014 will be held as per 
following schedule. The roll numbers of provisionally eligible candidates are arranged below in 
ascending order vertically (not in merit order). 

Jm~/ftcft c#i't ~rn- trfrlffi ~ tR' ~ ~ "# ~ 3tR 3McflaH &a011"1:ft-!$01~cc:, 
.;) " . 

ftcft-~~ -qcf ~D\'n01-~~3rrf # ~ ~ ll<n ~;); ~ ~ ~rn- trfrlffi ~ ~ ~~ 
Skill Test of Stenographer/Hindi will be conducted on computer in Mangal Font and candidate 
can give Skill Test by using one of the keyboards i.e. Devnagari-lnscript, Hindi-Traditional and 
Remington-Gaii/CBI. 

~: t~J\%~aJe<J ~ ~ $R:e:c;:;q,_c:: m $<rllhlif~g ?.ctafldl;:;?i ~ ~ (NiQl!'83fl$"311$tnJs3ffi"), 
~-124, $sf«;<Ol(>l l!lt<rr, -Q:>vr-8, ~-72 (<rl3ltiC!1 4lti'IQc>l 'tftc!:i), ~ (~) (<rl3l&fCfl ~)I 
Venue: Sahibzada Ajit Singh Institute of Information Technology & Research (SASIIT&R), C-124, 
Industrial Area, Phase-S, Sector-72 (Near PCL Chowk), Mohali (Punjab) (Near Chandigarh). 

~q'jf!Jj ~: 09:00 ~ ~ 
.;) 

Reporting Time: 09:00 AM
